name: Murk (itch) (Dreich)
description:
This is a very early prototype I was working on. I had a general theme that I wanted but didn't quite know what mechanics I wanted to implement. Because of that, some things aren't fleshed out and can just be broken.

WASD to move, UP Arrow to interect, LEFT Arrow to shoot, and SPACE to jump

Assets are from https://penusbmic.itch.io/
